result.title: Ad-/desorption performance of IEX resins towards short-chain PFAA
result.description: This deliverable is linked to task 72 where contaminated ground water will be treated using two advanced and innovative technical solutions a hybrid process consisting of granular activated carbon GAC and anion exchange IEX and enhanced ad and desorption of PM substances from GAC by polarization Samples will be obtained from the Rastatt test site Output data will be used in task 25 and results will feed in to the proposed policy action under review in WP3
